testcase.name: User access the Air Asia Home Page
testcase.system-out: Given I access the Air Asia web application home page.......................passed Then I verify all the expected top panel link are available.................passed And I verify that the booking panel is available............................passed And I verify that the login panel is available..............................passed

testcase.name: Login with without providing the credential information
testcase.system-out: Given I access the Air Asia web application home page.......................passed And I verify that the login panel is available..............................passed When I attemp to login with a blank username and password...................passed Then I very that the login attempt is failing with a notification message "Please enter your Email address.".passed

testcase.name: Login with invalid user credential
testcase.system-out: Given I access the Air Asia web application home page.......................passed And I verify that the login panel is available..............................passed When I attemp to login with an invalid username and password................passed Then I very that the login attempt is failing with a notification message "Please enter a valid email (e.g: example@email.com)".passed
